text: Dante Rigo (born 11 December 1998) is a Belgian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for ADO Den Haag in the Dutch Eredivisie on loan from PSV. He formerly played for Sparta Rotterdam. Rigo played his first game for PSV in September 2017, when PSV played a domestic cup match against SDC Putten.. ==Career== Rigo made his professional debut as Jong PSV player in the Eerste Divisie on 12 August 2016 against SC Cambuur.
